data.title: Dump
data.text: Don't do it!  What a mistake.  Poor quality food, drunk patrons that make you feel uncomfortable, vulgar music on the jukebox! I'm not saying that I'm against any of these things, but I'm saying that it is a very uncomfortable experience and if you have any pride where you spend your money avoid this place at all possible cost!

data.title: Didn't stay long
data.text: Ever watched Animal House? The bar scene where they walk in to see Otis Day and all the bar patrons stop and stare? It felt like that, and we didn't stick around long. Beer was cold, not sure if this place is still under construction or just really super casual.

data.title: What More Can You Say About a Sports Bar
data.text: We stopped in here for a drink after dinner.  The service at the table was quick, the beer was cold, and the music was loud.  We asked if there was a place to sit that wasn't right under a speaker.  We were told no, but they did turn down the volume so we could talk.  There were folks at the bar, and another table of eight that didn't seem to mind.  We were offered a menu but declined as we had just finished dinner.  If you’re out for a night of fun, this seems like a nice place to go.

data.title: Legacy bar for Cary !
data.text: This bar has been around at least 25 years. It has had different owners over the years and has expanded in size but it is still just a good neighborhood bar. Their chicken wings are some of the best around and they have then on special every Tuesday and Thursday !  There is always something going on here whether it is a dart league or a pool tournament.

data.title: Great Wings - Worth the trip!
data.text: Love the wings here.  Very good flavor, very good texture.  Watch out for the "regular" buffalo wings, they are hot!  Great local bar with great specials.

data.title: worst service i've had in a long, long time.
data.text: we went here because someone told us the wings were great.  we arrived hungry as retaurant goers are wont to do.   most tables were empty.   lots of action going on outside (smoking) and inside at the billiards tables and dart boards.  fine no prob.  our drink orders arrived fairly quickly.  it was too dark to read the menu so I had to take out it outside to read. we ordered the wings (surprise).  we then proceeded to wait, and wait, and wait some more.  we were starving.  we are not the complaining type; i worked as a waitress for 8 years.  we started staring at the kitchen. no wings.  to cut this story short. yes we did get the wings and devour them.  but the wait time was ridiculous and when the mgmt found out about our horrendous wait time they should have comp'ed us something.  nope, we paid in full. end of story.

data.title: Best Wings in Town!!!!
data.text: Holy best wings in my mouth! Great atmosphere, the regulars are the bees knees. If you're in the mood to chill, watch sports, drink beer, and eat some great food with great friends, this is the place for you! Even if I can't stay and eat I always make a point to get wings to-go.
